| First                   = Young Allies #3

| History                 = The United States Marine Corps is a branch of the US Armed Forces, serving as the amphibious force of the US military.

[[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Frank Castle]] (AKA the Punisher) served in the Marines during either the [[Vietnam War]] or the [[Siancong War]]. The training and combat experience he gained in the Marines is primarily the source of his ability in combating criminals as the Punisher.

[[Maria Hill (Earth-616)|Maria Hill]] served in the Marines before joining [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] and rose to the rank of Commander, despite being told during her training that she wouldn't be good enough.{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 13}}
